name: Phony
description:
IMPORTANT - PLEASE READ:

You MUST refresh the webpage to replay the game. I made a mistake and the session doesn't refresh properly upon hitting RESTART, so your actions in a past playthrough may affect your current playthrough unless you refresh your browser window before replaying.
I know this is a bit tedious and I apologize. I'll update the game when the jam ends!

This game was made for the Wanderjahre Game Jam #2 under the theme "Ten Minutes" and the restriction "One Scene". I took the optional theme as an opportunity to violently hammer Twine into a shape that roughly allows for a countdown. As for the mandatory restriction, I may have accidentally made two scenes; I genuinely can't tell. Whatever this is, I hope that it's at the very least a good learning experience. 

Though the experience is a short run, there are multiple endings, and the options available to you change based on what you've already done.

I regret to admit that the game is currently not accessible, as it contains many wordy images that don't have adequate alt text. I plan to rectify this as soon as possible.
